products.title: Splash Vine Green Panel Blind

products.productdescription:
Our moisture-resistant Splash vine green panel blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space.  The lush green panel is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its calming, saturated shade. 
 
As panel blinds reach a massive 5 metres width and 3,.5 metres drop, this makes it one of the largest blinds we make.  A popular blind for large windows and doors, or as a modern room-divider, this blind is not only durable but versatile by design. 
 
Panel blinds add a really modern feel to any space and at Swift Direct Blinds, when purchasing this blind you will also be able to take advantage of our free 5 year guarantee, which means investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.

A highly popular range, loved by our customers for its simplicity and value for money, our Splash fabrics come in a wide range of colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. This grey panel blind blends perfectly with any style or taste, whether your decor is on the modern, minimalist side or if you prefer to add bright and bold accessories. This panel blind with accompanying white components and grey fabric colour is a easy and quick way to update your window. 
 
One of the largest blinds we make, our panel blinds stretch to a massive five metres width and three and a half metres drop.  This makes panel blinds perfect for covering large windows that stretch the property, or conservatory windows and patio doors.  Another great alternative, is to use panel blinds as room divider, a unique and stylish way to divide space.  
 
Our panel blinds are value for money and easy to install. For ease of mind, all our products come with a 5 year guarantee, made in the heart of the Yorkshire textile homeland, Swift Direct Blinds upholds high quality products at highly-competitive online prices. 
 
 Product ID: DB-PAN0209 Fabric Colour: Grey Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: White Aluminium 5 channel track     Control Type: Cord or Wand Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes
